skillTree.localised_description: Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.
At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Dining upon the blood of slaughtered enemies may attract the notice, and maybe the favour, of the Hound.
The Fly Lord and his devotees despise Tzeentch, for his obsession with schemes and trickery are the polar opposite of Nurgle's delight in slow, musty stagnation.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Tzeentchian factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tzeentchian factions

skillTree.localised_description: The warband that followers the undefeated are elite amongst elite.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +15 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne and Bloodcrushers of Khorne units

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: None takes as many skulls as the one true destroyer of Khorne.

effects.description:
Skulls gained from kills: +15%
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: He who carries the Blood God's axe is feared and revered all the same.

effects.description: Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Bloodletters of Khorne and Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne units

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: His many feats travel forth as his name is whispered in shock and horror.
The Undefeated is blessed by his God's many boons.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 for Minotaurs of Khorne, Spawn of Khorne, Bloodthirster and Soul Grinder (Khorne) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: If he may be defeated or if he may flee, Khorne's punishment will be unrelenting.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +15% for Bloodthirster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Arbaal unleashes immense power as his axe hits it's mark, as the fury of Khorne pierces all in it's way.

target_if: Not on or below a platform

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from their mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Feet of Khorne march across the corpses of their enemies, as the Teeth of Death crush the life from those yet to die.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
This Khornate Lord's well of eternal rage never runs dry, nor does the ceaseless influx of warriors eager to serve under his command.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.
This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: There is no stopping this one's slaughter, for they are driven by the unquenchable lust for battle.
Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Pure, irrepressible rage is but an act of worship to the Blood God's glory.
This brutal Lord of Khorne decimates the lands of man and monster alike – the avatar or wrath incarnate!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

A unit with the Mark of Khorne has:
	➕ Frenzy Passive Ability
	➕ Increased  Spell Resistance
	➕ Increased  Armour
	➖ Reduced  Melee Defence
A unit with Executioner will execute units in combat below a 20% hit points threshold.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

factionEffects.localised_description: ''More battle, more feats, more victories, more skulls!'' - Arbaal the Destroyer of Khorne

effects.description: Destroyer of Khorne: Victories provide momentum and subsequent boons
Khorne's Curse: When defeated Khorne's punishment will be unrelenting

Attribute: Devastating Flanker for Hounds of Khorne units
	(all armies)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The Destroyer of Khorne channels the very essence of bloodlust and fury, gaining momentum with each smite and feat.

ui_effects.localised_text: Khorne's momentum will be set to 0
Arbaal is turned into a Chaos Spawn
Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.
At max effect intensity, grants the  Executor attribute
